thread.title: Energean plans London listing in March, aims to raise $500 million

title: Energean plans London listing in March, aims to raise $500 million
text: February 19, 2018 / 1:55 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago Energean plans London listing in March, aims to raise $500 million Reuters Staff 1 Min Read ATHENS (Reuters) - Energean plans to list on the London Stock Exchange in March and aims to raise about $500 million (356.53 million pounds), the Greek energy company said on Monday. Sources had told Reuters in November that the company was considering a London listing to raise cash for a $1.5 billion development of the Karish and Tanin fields off Israelâ€™s coast. Energean, a private exploration and production company operating in the eastern Mediterranean, bought the Karish and Tanin licences in December 2016. Editing by Jason Neely
